extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value:
Building on the Zombie World Field Spell, the Zombie Horde Structure Deck features an entire horde of the undead, allowing players to summon their boss monster back from their Graveyard and transform all monsters in the field to zombies.

Each Zombie Horde Structure Deck contains:
• 1 Preconstructed Deck of 42 cards
• 2 Ultra Rares
• 3 Super Rares
• 37 Commons
• 1 Beginner's Guide
• 1 Double-sided paper Deluxe Playmat/Dueling Guide

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value:
Building on the Zombie World Field Spell, the Zombie Horde Structure Deck features an entire horde of the undead, allowing players to summon their boss monster back from their Graveyard and transform all monsters in the field to zombies.

Each Display comes with 10 Zombie Horde Structure Decks each containing a preconstructed 42-card deck:
• 2 Ultra Rares
• 37 Commons
• 1 Beginner's Guide
• 1 Double-sided paper Deluxe Playmat/Dueling Guide

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: If this Normal Summoned/Set monster would be used as Synchro Material, 1 monster in your hand can be used as 1 of the other materials. If you do this, all materials for that Summon are banished instead of being sent to the GY. You cannot Special Summon monsters, except Zombie monsters.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value:
During the Standby Phase, if a face-up card is in a Field Zone and this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card in Defense Position. You can only use this effect of "Doomking Balerdroch" once per turn. Once per Chain, when a Zombie monster, except "Doomking Balerdroch", activates its effect (except during the Damage Step) (Quick Effect): You can apply 1 of these effects (but you cannot apply that same effect of "Doomking Balerdroch" again this turn).
• Negate that effect. • Banish 1 monster from the field or GY.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: "Zombie World" in the Field Zone cannot be destroyed by card effects, also neither player can target it with card effects. (Quick Effect): You can banish this card from your field or GY; activate 1 "Zombie World" directly from your hand or Deck. You can only use this effect of "Necroworld Banshee" once per turn.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: If this card is sent to the GY: You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 Level 5 or higher Zombie monster from your Deck to your hand, or, if "Zombie World" is in a Field Zone, you can Special Summon it from your Deck instead, also, in either case, you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except Zombie monsters. You can only use this effect of "Glow-Up Bloom" once per turn.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by controlling 2 or more Zombie-Type monsters, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. When this card is Special Summoned: Shuffle all other monsters on the field into the Deck, and if you do, this card's ATK becomes 1000 x the number of face-up Zombie-Type monsters shuffled into the Deck this way.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: You can Tribute Summon this card in face-up Attack Position by Tributing 1 Zombie-Type monster. When this card destroys a Zombie-Type monster by battle and sends it to the GY; You can Special Summon that monster to your side of the field.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: You can Normal Summon this card without Tributing. If you do, During the End Phase: Send it to the GY, Then take damage equal to its ATK in the GY. This card must be the only Zombie monster on the field to activate and to resolve this effect.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: f you have 2000 Life Points or less, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: This card's ATK becomes half the opponent's Life Points.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Once per turn: You can target 1 Level 4 or lower Zombie monster in your opponent's GY, that was destroyed by battle; Special Summon that target to your side of the field .

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: This card cannot be Special Summoned. You can Tribute this card to add 1 "Zombie World" from your Graveyard to your hand.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Once per turn: You can send 1 monster from your hand to the GY, then target 1 Level 4 or lower Zombie-Type monster in either player's GY; Special Summon that target. This card must be face-up on the field to activate and to resolve this effect.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can target 1 Zombie monster with 0 DEF in your GY; add it to your hand. Gain 300 ATK if you control another Zombie monster.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Zombie monster in your GY; Special Summon that target.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: During your Main Phase: You can send 1 Zombie monster from your Deck to the GY. If this card is sent to the GY: You can banish 1 Zombie monster from your GY, except "Gozuki"; Special Summon 1 Zombie monster from your hand. You can only use each effect of "Gozuki" once per turn.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value:
Once per turn: You can activate 1 of these effects.
• Banish 2 Zombie monsters from your GY; draw 1 card.
• Target 1 of your banished Zombie monsters; place that target on the top of your Deck.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 Zombie-Type monster with 2000 or less DEF from your Deck.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: When this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: Send the top card of their Deck to the GY. When this card is sent from the field to the GY: Add 1 Zombie monster with 1200 or less DEF from your Deck to your hand.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: If you control "Tristan, Knight of the Underworld", you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). Cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. You can target up to 2 Zombie monsters you control and declare a Level from 5 to 8; they become that Level until the end of this turn, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except Zombie monsters. You can only use this effect of "Isolde, Belle of the Underworld" once per turn.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: You can Tribute 1 Zombie monster; Special Summon 1 Zombie Tuner with 0 DEF from your Deck. If this card is banished: You can target 1 of your banished "Shiranui" monsters, except "Shiranui Solitaire", or up to 2 instead if "Shiranui Style Synthesis" is on the field; Special Summon them. You can only use each effect of "Shiranui Solitaire" once per turn.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: You can target 1 face-up monster on the field ; discard 1 card, and if you do, increase that target's Level by 1. You can target 1 face-up monster on the field; monsters you control can not attack for the rest of this turn, except Zombie monsters, also send 1 Zombie monster from your Deck to the GY, and if you do, Increase That target's Level by 1. You can only use Each effect of "Uni- Zombie " once per turn.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: You can discard this card to the GY to take control of 1 face-up Fiend or Zombie monster your opponent controls until the End Phase this turn.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: If this card is sent to the GY for a Synchro Summon: You can target 1 Level 4 or lower Zombie monster in your GY; Special Summon that target.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: FLIP: You can Special Summon any number of "Black Sheep Tokens" (Zombie/DARK/Level 1/ATK 0/ DEF 0).

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: If a Level 5 or higher Zombie monster is on the field: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; take control of it until the End Phase. During your Main Phase, if this card is in your GY: You can shuffle 1 of your banished Zombie monsters into the Deck, and if you do, Set this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use 1 "Zombie Necronize" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Target 1 Zombie monster on the field; until the end of this turn, it gains 1000 ATK or loses 1000 ATK. During your Main Phase, if this card is in your GY: You can shuffle 1 of your banished Zombie monsters into the Deck, and if you do, Set this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use this effect of "Zombie Power Struggle" once per turn.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: All monsters on the field and in the GYs become Zombie monsters. Neither player can Tribute Summon monsters, except Zombie monsters.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Target 1 Zombie monster you control with 2000 or less ATK; it can attack your opponent directly this turn.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Target 1 Zombie monster in your GY and 1 monster in your opponent's GY; Special Summon the first target, also banish the second target.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Once per turn: You can Special Summon 1 Zombie monster from your hand. You must control no monsters to activate and to resolve this effect.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Send 1 monster from your deck to the GY.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Tribute 1 monster; excavate cards from the top of your deck up to you excavate a monster that can be Normal Summoned/Set. Special Summon it, also send the other excavated cards to the Graveyard .

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Both players reveal their hands, each player chooses 1 card from their opponent's hand, then you discard the chosen cards from both players' hands, then both players draw 1 card.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Target up to 3 banished monsters; return them to the GY.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: For the rest of this turn, each time a card(s) is added from the Main Deck or GY to your opponent's hand, except by drawing them, you immediately draw 1 card. You can only activate 1 "Shared Ride" per turn.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Banish 1 Zombie monster on the field, then Special Summon 1 Zombie monster from the GY of the player who controlled it, to their field, in Defense Position. If this card is in your GY: You can shuffle 1 of your banished Zombie monsters into the Deck, and if you do, Set this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Return of the Zombies" once per turn.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: If you control no monsters: Target 1 Zombie monster in your GY; Special Summon it. If you control no monsters: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Zombie monster in your GY; Special Summon it, but its effects are negated. You can only use 1 "Haunted Shrine" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: When a Zombie monster(s) is Special Summoned from your opponent's GY to your field: Target 2 cards on the field; destroy them.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Send the top 5 cards of your Deck to the GY.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Take 1 Field Spell from your Deck, and either activate it or add it to your hand.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Both players must Set Spell Cards before activating them, and can not activate them until their next turn after Setting them.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
Gains 100 ATK/DEF for each Zombie monster on the field and in the GYs. When another Zombie monster is destroyed by battle: You can Special Summon 1 Zombie monster from either GY to your field. You can only use this effect of "Red-Eyes Zombie Necro Dragon" once per turn.
